item.title: About
item.description: About this site # I’m nearing my 4 year anniversary at Benchling and, in the tradition of an undergraduate thesis at the end of college, I thought it’d be worth writing up all of my learnings in a place where others can read them. The target audience for this is current Benchlings and ex-Benchlings, though there’s nothing company-sensitive or non-public on this site. What is your goal in writing this?

item.title: Organizational memory is very short
item.description: Organizational memory is very short # Median tenure at a tech company is about 2.5 years, and getting shorter. And while I think that’s generally good for employees, who can grow in their careers, compensation, and opportunities by switching roles frequently, it makes the companies themselves weaker. The best people for the job # It took me a long time to realize that the smartest technologists, the people who really know what they’re doing, they don’t often write in a public facing way where other people can read it.

item.title: Complexity is often irreducible
item.description: Complexity is often irreducible unless you change the problem # We work in a pretty complex industry. Understanding a single customer, and every aspect of what they’re doing, is pretty hard. Extending it to lots of customers is even harder. Still, people try, but I see a logical error over and over again when they do so. Make me a song # Let’s pick a different industry just to use as an analogy - music.

item.title: Example draft
item.description: This is an example page that shows me what Hugo Book can do # Columns # Columns help organize shorter pieces of content horizontally for readability. {{< columns >}} <!-- begin columns block --> # Left Content Lorem markdownum insigne... <---> <!-- magic separator, between columns --> # Mid Content Lorem markdownum insigne... <---> <!-- magic separator, between columns --> # Right Content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{< /columns >}} Buttons # Buttons are styled links that can lead to local page or external link.

item.title: Sanjay's Draft Area
item.description: Sanjay’s Draft Area # Welcome to the secret part of my site. See below for potential topics I may write about (whether I write about them or not depends on a combination of your feedback, how motivated I feel, how easy they are to write about, and the weather, among other things). General tech # Integrations between software systems Messaging loses subtlety going up and down hierarchies The point of highest leverage is the customer story Can operations speed you up?
